ygData.subject: OOC: Judgement, please!
ygData.msgSnippet: A number of times in the past few days, Aerosmith has intercepted weapons fire by shooting it down.  Last time I checked, that s a clear violation of RPG

A number of times in the past few days, Aerosmith has intercepted 
weapons fire by shooting it down.  Last time I checked, that's a 
clear violation of RPG rules.  Moderators, could you work this out?
